item.title: Adding HTML files | Ep. 03
item.description: Hello Guys in this part, we are going to bind our application with an HTML page.

item.title: Adding static files Flask | Ep. 04
item.description: Hii, In this segment, we are learning about how to add stylesheets, javascript, and images to our application.

item.title: Jinja Templating Flask | Ep. 05
item.description: Hello, In the last segment, we talk a bit about Jinja templating. So in this segment, we are going to learn about How to work with Jinja templating engine with Html.

item.title: Flask application structure | Ep. 02
item.description: This part is about how to structure your application and create new routes. You’ll learn about the different structure of your application.

item.title: Your First Flask Applaction | Ep. 01
item.description:
Im Glad you think to learn Flask.

In this part, you will be creating a simple web application with minimum requirements.

We’re going to use a virtual environment throughout this series of learning.
